definition: a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]
to print/to publish/publication/periodical/to peel with a knife/to carve/to amend
old variant of 刊[kan1]/to peel with a knife/to carve/to amend

sentences.english: Saturday was the representative work of periodicals of civil literature in early Minguo.
sentences.chinese: 《礼拜六》是民国初年市民文学期刊的代表作。

sentences.english: The results are published in the journal Cardiovascular Ultrasound.
sentences.chinese: 研究结果公布在心血管超声波期刊上。

sentences.english: They published their findings in a recent issue of the Journal of Sexual Medicine.
sentences.chinese: 他们在最近的性医学期刊中发表了其调查结果。

sentences.english: What‘s the total circulation of this journal?
sentences.chinese: 这份期刊的总发行量是多少？

sentences.english: He was editor of The Auk.
sentences.chinese: 他曾是著名鸟类学期刊《海雀》的编辑。

sentences.english: The Plant Varieties Journal - Download provide thee-journal available in PDF.
sentences.chinese: 该网站上提供了植物新品种期刊的电子版下载。

sentences.english: The study appears in the journal Nature  Geoscience.
sentences.chinese: 这项研究发表在《自然地球科学》期刊上。

sentences.english: Academic contends on the founding of Periodical Science is a rather fierce topic in the periodicals-related circle in China.
sentences.chinese: 期刊学是我国期刊界学术争鸣比较激烈的研究领域。

sentences.english: Academic contends on the founding of Periodical Science is a rather fierce topic in the periodicals-related circle in China.
sentences.chinese: 期刊学是我国期刊界学术争鸣比较激烈的研究领域。

sentences.english: The work is in the journal Public Library of Science One. [Jordi Duch, Joshua Waitzman and Luis Amaral, http://bit.ly/azpqyU]
sentences.chinese: 他的研究发表在《第一公共科学图书馆》期刊上。

sentences.english: Editors of academic journal should become scholar-style editor and reach high spiritual confine.
sentences.chinese: 办学术期刊对于办刊人的精神境界要求很高。

sentences.english: The development of the 4th edition of the "A guide to the Core Journal of China" is in progress.
sentences.chinese: 第四版《中文核心期刊要目总览》正在研制当中。

sentences.english: It is an important representative of Chinese journal in the world's third-party media data.
sentences.chinese: 在世界第三方媒体数据中是中国期刊的重要代表。

sentences.english: The efficiency of searching is the key problem of an E-journal Website.
sentences.chinese: 检索效率是关系到电子期刊网站生死存亡的一处问题。

sentences.english: As a journalist of a famous journal, he journeyed frequently.
sentences.chinese: 作为一家知名期刊的新闻记者，他常常旅行。

sentences.english: The study is due to be published next month in the scientific journal Laterality .
sentences.chinese: 这项研究的结果将于下月在科学期刊《侧性》上发表。

definition: paper/treatise/thesis/CL:篇[pian1]/to discuss a paper or thesis (old)
to carry a story/to publish (in a newspaper or magazine)
